document.full_text: the white house announced a five-point program of steps to isolate col. muammar el-qaddafi and ultimately drive him from power, but all stopped short of military action.
document.title: u.s. escalates pressure on libya amid mixed signals
lines_and_colors: the white house announced a five-point program of steps to isolate col. muammar el-qaddafi and ultimately drive him from power, but all stopped short of military action.
